amendment.description: To permanently extend and modify the research and experimentation tax credit and strike the partial exclusion of dividends provision.

action.text: Amendment SA 577 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 577 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 154.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 577.

Amendment SA 577 proposed by Senator Cantwell. (consideration: CR S6191-6195) To permanently extend and modify the research and experimentation tax credit and strike the partial exclusion of dividends provision.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 577 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 154.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 577 proposed by Senator Cantwell.
